title: Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "The Natural and the Supernatural Jew" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1962
medium: Lithography in purple and black ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover at lower right in black ink: Jacket design by Elaine Lustig.
On the cover at the top center in black ink: The/Natural/and the/ Supernatural/ Jew
At center bottom: Arthur A. Cohen
At top left: An Historical and Theological Introduction
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Book jacket for "The Natural and the Supernatural Jew" by Arthuer A. Cohen. A band of purple is placed in the upper half of the page, while the title and author are printed over this rectangle as well as the rest of the white page in black ink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "The Natural and the Supernatural Jew" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1962.
1962. Lithography in purple and black ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-54.
